synopsis.text: While on a break from his web design job in Tokyo, Souta Tawara returns to his hometown in Kagawa to settle his family's affairs after his father's passing. He finds a young boy, Poco, sleeping in his father's old udon restaurant. As Souta provides food and clothing for Poco, he discovers that the boy is actually a shape-shifting tanuki. Feeling a connection with the energetic and playful Poco, Souta decides to take him in and care for him. As they spend time together, Souta reflects on his own past and his relationship with his father. Now, Souta must decide whether to return to his job in Tokyo or stay in the countryside with Poco, as they embark on heartwarming adventures in the "Udon Kingdom."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
